inclusion.criterion: approximately 1-2 weeks prior to her expected date of follow up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: conversation and invited to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: interviewed by clinical research nurse using prepared proforma (Form A)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptoms suggestive of disease recurrence and treatment induced toxicity recorded
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: short written informed consent taken at OPD visit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: physical examination and investigations performed by examining physician
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: final impression of disease status and toxicity recorded
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: information regarding nurse-led telephonic follow-up collected using Form C
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient drop-out/ Lost-to-follow up defined and managed
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Stage III disease treated with palliative intent with once monthly radiotherapy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Early stage cervical cancer patients who underwent Wertheims hysterectomy and completed adjuvant radiochemotherapy due to high-risk factors
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease, works in a rehab center, and has regular exercise habits. She does not smoke and is not on any medications.
